Search for Flights
For
Passengers
{{flight.airline}}
{{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}} remaining seats
{{flight.departure?.place}}
{{flight.departure?.time | date }}
{{flight.departure?.time | date:'shortTime' }}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival?.place}}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date }}
{{flight.arrival?.time | date:'shortTime' }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FlightService } from './../api/services/flight.service' import { FlightRm } from '../api/models' import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent implements OnInit { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [] constructor(private flightService: FlightService, private fb: FormBuilder) { } searchForm = this.fb.group({ from: [''], destination: [''], fromDate: [''], toDate: [''], numberOfPassengers: [1] }) ngOnInit(): void { } search() { this.flightService.searchFlight(this.searchForm.value) .subscribe({ next: r => this.searchResult = r, error: this.handelError, }); } private handelError(err: any) { console.log(err) } }
